name: Viaero Wireless
tag_list: wireless, cellular, phone, mobile, data-plan, telecommunications
overview: Originally only providing cellular service in rural areas of Colorado, Viaero Wireless now provides comprehensive data and mobile voice coverage to users in Colorado, Nebraska, Wyoming and Kansas. Since its founding in 1991, Viaero Wireless has expanded quickly. With over 400 retail locations, and a vastly-growing service area, the company utilizes cutting-edge wireless technology to provide its subscribers with the best mobile coverage available. Viaero customers can also purchase heavily discounted devices, including smartphones with the most sophisticated operating systems, including Android and Blackberry OS. Viaero is currently expanding its service area by building new towers in all the states it covers, and is proud to support Colorado’s agriculture community in Fort Morgan. Viaero helps the local economy by staffing its regional offices with Fort Morgan natives, providing office-based employees with a comfortable home away from home.
